pageContext.claim: “The DACA decision, while a highly political one, and seemingly not based on the law, gives the President of the United States far more power than EVER anticipated. Nevertheless, I will only act in the best interests of the United States of America!”
pageContext.analysis: The 5-4 decision written by Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. found the administration had not provided proper legal justification to end DACA. In other words, the technical decision was “based on the law.”
